SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface ClientService

All Superinterfaces:
CrudService<Client>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientServiceImpl
public interface ClientService extends CrudService<Client>
Interface providing methods for managing clients. Extends the CrudService interface to inherit basic CRUD operations for Client entities. In addition to the basic CRUD operations, this service provides methods for adding a single client or a list of clients.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Long
    addClient(ClientDto clientDto)
    Adds a new client.
    List<Long>
    addClients(List<ClientDto> clientsDto)
    Adds multiple clients.

    Methods inherited from interface com.app.service.CrudService

    findAllByIds, findById, removeAllByIds, removeElement

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      Long addClient(ClientDto clientDto)
      Adds a new client.
      Parameters:
      clientDto - the DTO containing the client data to be added
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly added client

    • addClients

      List<Long> addClients(List<ClientDto> clientsDto)
      Adds multiple clients.
      Parameters:
      clientsDto - a list of DTOs containing the client data to be added
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the newly added clients
